enumValues.description: A reference to a configured Account under reseller

enumValues.description: A reference to a configured Site within Account
enumValues.name: site

enumValues.description: A reference to the configured VPN User within Account
enumValues.name: vpnUser

enumValues.description: Geographical and political entity recognized internationally
enumValues.name: country

enumValues.description: Represents a state or territory within a country. It is a sub-division of the country
enumValues.name: countryState

enumValues.description: Time zone, which is a geographical region where clocks are set to the same time
enumValues.name: timezone

enumValues.description: A reference to the configured Host within Site
enumValues.name: host

enumValues.description: Any entity (matches everything)
enumValues.name: any

enumValues.description: A reference to the configured Network Interface within Site
enumValues.name: networkInterface

enumValues.description: An account administrator (user in Cato Console)

enumValues.description: A settlement with over 1K population

enumValues.name: score
